description: Lily LaBeau's world is turned completely upside down when she discovers her true identity as a patient in a sadistic hospital. Doctors Mark Davis and Bobbi Starr take Lily back to the hospital where she undergoes harder treatment and stricter bondage. This is a great update with role play, bondage sex, fisting, corporal punishment, anal butt plug, water punishment and more.
title: Lily's Delusion
